original_title: Wanneer de Zon Schijnt Onder Te Gaan
overview: An intriguing mosaic film in which we follow a number of characters on the beach. A woman starts talking to someone who has dialed the wrong number, a son tries to explain to his mother why he has already deposited 2,000 euros to his girlfriend he has never seen and we also see someone walking around with a metal detector.
title: Wanneer de Zon Schijnt Onder Te Gaan
